pp2.5:13.1: ussāraṇaññeva → ussādanaṁ yeva (bj, pts-vp-pli1); ussādanaññeva (sya-all, mr)
pp2.5:17.1: sandhāretuṁ → santānetuṁ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | āvikatvā → āvīkatvā (bj)
pp2.5:21.1: ussāraṇaññeva → ussādanaṁyeva (bj, pts-vp-pli1); ussādanaññeva (sya-all) | sandhāretuṁ → santānetuṁ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
pp2.5:31.2: appicchataṁyeva → appicchaṁyeva (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | idamatthitaṁyeva → idamaṭṭhitaṁ yeva (bj); idamaṭṭhikaṁyeva (pts-vp-pli1)
